document_data.name: Jade Ladies
document_data.mainbody: The '''Jade Ladies''' were elemental [[spirit]]s and servants of the [[Celestial Empire]]. They acted at the direction of [[Shu Chia]] of the [[Nine Immortals]], God of Artificers and the Arts.<ref>
document_data.Description: They were transparent women who wore magnificent [[jade]] headdresses and green robes.
document_data.Activities: They were in charge of creating and burying valuable and lovely things in the earth, namely rare [[metal]]s and [[jewels]]. Their abilities allowed them to create rich amounts of [[jade]] in hidden locations and to weave [[gold]], [[silver]], and [[copper]] into the veins of stone, which would later be discovered by miners and craftspeople.
